sections.heading: Tattoo, defined.Tattoo means the indelible decorative mark, figure, or design introduced by insertion of nontoxic dyes or pigments into or under the subcutaneous portion of the skin upon the body of a live human being
sections.text: SourceLaws 2004, LB 906, ยง 15;R.S.Supp.,2006, ยง 71-370.01;Laws 2007, LB463, ยง 315.
